reviews.review: Jogo bom pra passar raiva, mas vale apena jogar

Very fun game with friends. Non-prime is pretty bad, because you can't even play competitive (you can only play casual and casual = stinky). Prime is way better and in my opinion it's worth it. Well you can still play Retakes, Arms race etc. 
If non-prime 4-5/10
If prime 8.5/10
